channel.title: Apocalypse Keys (2 series, Playtest)
channel.description:
![227335_1304585_1004|331x500](upload://eVHeRIvzaQpGaL7kA5Ewsa8pfzD.jpeg)
For the first 24 hours of posting, please only sign up for this game if I have run one game or less for you!
***The Apocalypse is coming, and humanity is desperate. We need monsters to defeat monsters. We are those monsters.***
***To unlock the Doors to the Apocalypse, we must gather enough Keys: of knowledge, wisdom, secrets.***
***This is a story of mystery, found family, of monsters that are heroes.***
**NOTE: Please only sign up if you're interested in playtesting!**
I would prefer if participants could attend both sessions if possible. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. Our first session will focus on character/setting creation, with some initial roleplay.
This session is scheduled for 3 hours. I will email everyone a week ahead to confirm attendance. Sessions will be recorded through Zoom for reference, but only released for public consumption if all players consent.
Apocalypse Keys is a *Powered by the Apocalypse* game, inspired by the mechanics of Libreté, Changeling: The Lost Pbta, Hearts of Wulin, and Brindlewood Bay. Gain tokens of Darkness by giving into your monstrous nature, but make sure the Darkness doesn't get too close...
**Touchstones:** Mostly Hellboy (both the comics and movies), touched of Supernatural (the tv series) and Hellsing (the anime).
**Content Warning** : This is a game that focuses on horror, the supernatural, and emotional relationships.
**Safety tools** : We will be using script change, lines and veils, and an open door policy. We can change these tools to whatever suits the table best. This game follows [The Gauntlet's Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
**TWO SHOT MINI SERIES**: **Session 1**: [date=2020-04-29 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M22YiXLms8Q83lVfbSi](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-M22YiXLms8Q83lVfbSi&v=3) **Session 2**: [date=2020-04-30 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M22ZE6QwG4TJlrAJPo5](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-M22ZE6QwG4TJlrAJPo5&v=3)
**FIVE PART SERIES** **Session 1**: [date=2020-05-02 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M22awEkwoe5ZGm9zXZK](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-M22awEkwoe5ZGm9zXZK&v=3) **Session 2**: [date=2020-05-09 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M22b8W4pmWOH2_QxXwJ](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-M22b8W4pmWOH2_QxXwJ&v=3) **Session 3**: [date=2020-05-16 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M22bJnNdmZH56iBuo0t](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-M22bJnNdmZH56iBuo0t&v=3) **Session 4**: [date=2020-05-23 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M22bT3SIbVGNqU8MfdQ](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-M22bT3SIbVGNqU8MfdQ&v=3) **Session 5**: [date=2020-05-30 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M22bcIKw53ydYabJOeU](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-M22bcIKw53ydYabJOeU&v=3)
